title: COVID-19: Who is protecting the people with disabilities? – UN rights expert
text:
Little has been done to provide people with disabilities with the guidance and support needed to protect them during the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, even though many of them are part of the high-risk group, today warned the UN Special Rapporteur on the rights of persons with disabilities, Catalina Devandas. “People with disabilities feel they have been left behind,” the UN human rights expert said.… Read more on https://africa-newsroom.com/press/covid19-who-is-protecting-the-people-with-disabilities–un-rights-expert?lang=en
